body.p: The requirements in paragraphs 2, 16–21, 24 and 29–31 relate to matters addressed within the joint ventures project that led to amendments to IAS 28. Paragraphs describing the Board’s considerations in reaching its conclusions on IAS 28 are numbered with the prefix BC.
